com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.configuration

Interface NbsIntegrationConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Configuration

    public interface NbsIntegrationConfiguration
    Represents configuration data for the API client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.lang.String getBaseUrl()
      Gets the base URL for the national system.
      ConnectionIdentifier getConnectionIdentifier()
      Gets a connection identifier.
      boolean getDetectRepeatedSinglePackRequests()
      Gets a value indicating whether the integration library will detect repeated decommission or reactivation requests for single packs over a configured period and prevent passing those requests to the National System.

      Gets the URL for the identity server system.

      • getMaxBulkPackCount

        int getMaxBulkPackCount()
        Gets the maximum number of packs allowed in a bulk request. This value is ultimately dictated by the National System.
        Returns:
        The maximum number of packs allowed in a bulk request.

      • setMaxBulkPackCount

        void setMaxBulkPackCount(int value)
        Sets the maximum number of packs allowed in a bulk request. This value is ultimately dictated by the National System.
        Parameters:
        value - The maximum number of packs allowed in a bulk request.

      • getStoreAndForwardBulkRequests

        boolean getStoreAndForwardBulkRequests()
        Gets a value indicating whether bulk requests should be stored and forwarded as single pack requests when the client is off-line. By default, bulk requests are not stored when on-line for future forwarding to the the National System. If this value is set to true, when offline, the integration library will convert each pack in the bulk request to single pack request. The results will be contained in the recovery results after forwarding once the library return to on-line mode.
        Returns:
        A value indicating whether bulk requests should be stored and forwarded as single pack requests when the client is off-line.

      • setStoreAndForwardBulkRequests

        void setStoreAndForwardBulkRequests(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether bulk requests should be stored and forwarded as single pack requests when the client is off-line. By default, bulk requests are not stored when on-line for future forwarding to the the National System. If this value is set to true, when offline, the integration library will convert each pack in the bulk request to single pack request. The results will be contained in the recovery results after forwarding once the library return to on-line mode.
        Parameters:
        value - A value indicating whether bulk requests should be stored and forwarded as single pack requests when the client is off-line.

      • getDetectRepeatedSinglePackRequests

        boolean getDetectRepeatedSinglePackRequests()
        Gets a value indicating whether the integration library will detect repeated decommission or reactivation requests for single packs over a configured period and prevent passing those requests to the National System.
        Returns:
        a value indicating whether the integration library will detect repeated decommission or reactivation requests for single packs over a configured period and prevent passing those requests to the National System.

      • setDetectRepeatedSinglePackRequests

        void setDetectRepeatedSinglePackRequests(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether the integration library will detect repeated decommission or reactivation requests for single packs over a configured period and prevent passing those requests to the National System.
        Parameters:
        value - a value indicating whether the integration library will detect repeated decommission or reactivation requests for single packs over a configured period and prevent passing those requests to the National System.

      • getRepeatedSinglePackRequestsWindowInSeconds

        int getRepeatedSinglePackRequestsWindowInSeconds()
        Gets the number of seconds that the integration library will retain a knowledge of recent requests when the 'Detect Repeated Single Pack Requests' option is being used.
        Returns:
        the number of seconds that the integration library will retain a knowledge of recent requests when the 'Detect Repeated Single Pack Requests' option is being used.

      • setRepeatedSinglePackRequestsWindowInSeconds

        void setRepeatedSinglePackRequestsWindowInSeconds(int value)
        Sets the number of seconds that the integration library will retain a knowledge of recent requests when the 'Detect Repeated Single Pack Requests' option is being used.
        Parameters:
        value - the number of seconds that the integration library will retain a knowledge of recent requests when the 'Detect Repeated Single Pack Requests' option is being used.
